name: Furball: in the Land of Dreams
name_original: Furball: in the Land of Dreams
description:
The Story

Mr Nobody, lord of the Land of Dreams kidnapped two little girls, Ala and Gabi. Now their toy Furball must find and rescue them.

The Game

Furball is a casual 2D platform game for children. It has simple controls (arrows / pad trigger + 2 action buttons) and nice, cartoon graphics. Hope you enjoy it :)

Languages

* Polish
* English

Controls
* arrows / WSAD or left gamepad trigger - player movement
* SPACE or gamepad A - jump
* left / right ALT or gamepad X - fire sligshot (you have to find it first!)

Credits

Graphics and audio used in Furball come from different sources:

  • Unity Asset Store
  • OpenGameArt.org
  • Spriters-resource.com
  • Freesound.org
  • http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/
  • GameArt2D.com

...and many other royalty-free sites. Thank you guys for sharing your work! I'm sorry I don't list you all by names, but to be honest I lost track of what was made by who. If you see something that is yours, please contact me. I'll be happy to add you to the list.

Magun
